Description: Round-topped limestone stela of Senusret with painted detail divided into three registers: 1 - Three rows of Hieroglyphic text. 2 - Scene of the deceased and wife seated before an offering-table. 3 - Three male and two female standing figures.
Bibliographic references: Scott-Moncrieff 1912 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 2. (pl.28)
